title: Air filled capacitor disconnected move distance

content.question: An air-filled parallel-plate capacitor of capacitance C is connected to a battery and charged to a voltage V. The capacitor is then disconnected from the battery. If the distance between the capacitor plates is halved while the charge on the capacitor remains the same, which of the following is true?

choices.label: Neither C nor V will change.
Both C and V will be halved.
C will be doubled and V will be halved.
C will be halved and V will be doubled.
Both C and V will be doubled.

content.answer: C will be doubled and V will be halved.
